full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,YI DAM DANG CHOS SKYONG SO SO'I SGRUB THABS DANG RJES GNANG BYED TSUL GYI CHO GA DNGOS GRUB 'BYUNG GNAS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @041A *, ,(CES YI DAM CHOS SKYONG SO SO'I SGRUB THABS DANG RJES GNANG BYED TSUL GYI CHO GA DNGOS GRUB 'BYUNG GNAS ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, 'JAM DBYANGS GONG MA CHEN MO'I GSER GYI BKA' LUNG GIS BSNGAGS PA'I DGA' LDAN BSTAN RIGS GLING GI, ,H'A BLA MA DGE SLONG BLO BZANG TSUL KHRIMS, TSOGS CHEN DGE BSKOS DGE SLONG 'JAM DBYANGS NOR BU SOGS DON GNYER CAN MANG PO YANG DANG YANG DU BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS, BLA MA DAM PA RNAMS KYIS MDZAD PA'I CHO GA'I GZHIR BYAS NAS CHIG 'GA' RE TZAS GSAR DU BCOS NAS LAG TU BLANG BDE BAR, ,LHAG TSANG LHA MO'I KHRI ZUR GYI NA BA DKON MCHOG CHOS LDAN GYIS BSGRIGS PA'O, ,DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,)
